law.text: The board shall issue a license to all applicants who meet the requirements of this chapter and who pay to the board the initial license fee provided in KRS 334A.160 as prescribed by board regulations.
law.history: Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 483, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 236, sec. 15.
